snippet: It is time to focus on the folks going to Rio without fear or complaint — like Diana Taurasi and Sue Bird, who hope to win their fourth gold with the United States women’s basketball team....
abstract: Harvey Araton On Olympics column asserts that it is time for public to focus on athletes who are competing at 2016 Olympics rather than those who are sitting out; calls particular attention to United States women's national basketball team, which has won five straight Olympic gold medals, has 41-game winning streak and has become premier dynasty of Olympic team sports.
lead_paragraph: It is time to focus on the folks going to Rio without fear or complaint — like Diana Taurasi and Sue Bird, who hope to win their fourth gold with the United States women’s basketball team.

headline.print_headline: Let James and Others Bail. These Women? No Chance.
headline.main: Let LeBron James and Others Bail From Rio. These Women? Not a Chance.
